description: the app in lagging with errors

This App is amazing. It has a very huge potential to get REALLY good. As it is now, 28th September 2022 the Program is very much usable and very conveniently to use, you can still feel though that it needs some polishment.

One part that might be hard to change is the load time of artists.

But all in all really good and reccomendable app. Will just ge better
summary: Amazing App. Definitely recommend to try it out

description: The UI is very questionable, in terms of look and feel, and it doesn't play the right songs half the time.
can be better and will in time
A music player that can't read my local files is trash.

I click a song and it plays something completely different
Why's dis happening!
I click to play song, but nothing happen.

Found my music, got all the lyrics, and it is fluent. There is some odd things like some tracks have no pictures, but I can go to the artist's page and find the song there on Nuclear and it has the correct track image. 
You can change your lyrics source and music source, by deafult it uses Youtube but you can change it to Soundcloud and a few others.

It's important to remember this is early development, but I already find it easy to use and I love that it has an 'autoraudio craziness' level in the settings, creative but not positive how it works. Good stuff!
The intention is good, but as it is, this music player has nothing to do on an app store that's accessible to the general public... This isn't even an alpha version... (June 2021)
summary: Great idea, but this doesn't work well..

description:
It works pretty well when it actually works. It has trouble with some music for no apparent reason and works well with others. It's a fantastic player, GUI and features wise, but any player that struggles to actually play music is not good. It earns the three stars because the devs clearly put work into it and I dont think its fair to say its trash over some bugs.

It does need more work though, devs.

A great streaming player, so far.
Of course it has room for improvement - everything has. Nothing is perfect.
Was not aware of it, came to know about it from one of the YT channel I follow.

Window lags (resize, max/min and so on) on X11 and Wayland GNOME session. Also, many JavaScript pop-up errors before play song. Maybe it's because of Flathub version, idk, but this app is not usable these days.
summary: Window lags, many JavaScript pop-up errors before play song

description: crashes when i try to play a song. downloading works though
All looks great and worked as expected except for the fact that nuclear was using 56% of my cpu when brought to the foreground. Flatpak on Fedora 36 GNOME
summary: Great start but high cpu usage

description: Absolutely fantastic. Songs load quickly, spotify playlists can be imported effortlessly, I've never had any issues nor have I ever had issues finding obscure songs. AMAZING.
summary: AMAZING. Extactly like Spotify, but free

description: No reproduce, estetica e idea buena...
summary: No reproduce, estetica e idea buena..
